title: [Fan Art] Zed skin: Off the Grid Zed
body:
First off, sorry this isn't master tier work, but I tried hard, and hopefully people can see that and like the idea.
Secondly, please don't be too mean.
Lastly, I sincerely hope people like my "drawing." I spent a long time working on it.
EDIT: I think the blades came out too carrot orange and not "Empirical" enough.

replies.body: it looks good man keep up the good{{champion:238}}

this looks sweet and it would be cool to see this skin on zed against a project yasuo.
i hope rito considers this
this is amazing. would buy it in a heartbeat
Nice art I'll definitely show this to the Zed player of the house.
great work man!!  you should make a jinx tron skin!

Thank you all for your kind words, I appreciate them all so much.
I should have drawn his shadow too, because the idea would be that it'd be pixilated and static-y but I wasn't confident in my talent to have even tried it.{{item:3070}}
I think you should draw the shadow I mean you did so great with zed why not draw his shadow?
he looks like he is from tron?

> [{quoted}](name=mobius1galm16,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=KraaXR39,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2014-12-28T23:50:21.352+0000)
>
> he looks like he is from tron?

Yeah, I based him off a mixture of Rinzler from Tron Legacy, and Beck from Tron: Uprising.
Hence why "The Grid" (the name of the Tron city)
it looks really cool I wish rito would give him this skin
I definitely don't hate it. You did a fine job here!
I like the carrot orange, it should "pop" on his model. Maybe then I'd be able to see them in-game. All in all, nice and simple. I like it.

i want to see unmasked {{champion:238}} .

hopes he looks hot
Presumably like this. (not my artwork,  obviously)
I wonder if you can make the beam purple. Give it a shadow tech design
